header_text: Your marriage is extremely important to you. Lately, you have been lashing out at your spouse more often, and you worry about how this will affect your marriage. You seek the advice of a counselor and remember that your spouse's love is unconditional.

elements.Text: Will your spouse stop loving you because of your recent behavior?
